description: Number of rooted polygonal cacti (Husimi graphs) with n nodes.
references: F. Bergeron, G. Labelle and P. Leroux, Combinatorial Species and Tree-Like Structures.
F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Graphical Enumeration, p. 71
links: F. Harary and R. Z. Norman, The Dissimilarity Characteristic of Husimi Trees, Annals of Mathematics, 58 1953, pp. 134-141.
F. Harary and G. E. Uhlenbeck, On the Number of Husimi Trees, Proc. Nat. Acad. Sci. USA vol. 39 pp. 315-322 1953
Index entries for sequences related to cacti
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: Shifts left under transform T where Ta = EULER(BIK(a)-a).
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 15 1998
